prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon with cotton-like features and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a cute, small Pokemon that floats in the air with balloon-like orbs.
Generate a grass-type Pokemon with a round body and a playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a soft, tranquil appearance.
Make a whimsical Pokemon with light colors and a gentle demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a cloud and loves to play in grassy fields.
Give me a Pokemon that is always cheerful and brings joy to its surroundings.

distinctive_features: Cotton-like orbs on top of its head
